001package pkg_class;
002import java.util.List;
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004/**
005 * ...
006 *
007 * @author Elie DUBOUX
008 * @version (un numÃ©ro de version ou une date)
009 */
010public class Pnj
011{
012    /**
013     * The name of the pnj.
014     */
015    private String aName;
016    /**
017     * His speech when the player talk to him.
018     */
019    protected List<String> aSpeechs;
020    /**
021     * Constructor
022     * @param pName The name of the pnj.
023     * @param pSpeech The text the pnj will tell to the player.
024     */
025    public Pnj(final String pName, final String pSpeech)
026    {
027        this.aName = pName;
028        this.aSpeechs = new ArrayList<String>();
029        this.aSpeechs.add(pSpeech);
030    }//PNJ()
031    
032    /**
033     * Constructor with a basic speech.
034     * @param pName The name of the pnj.
035     */
036    public Pnj(final String pName)
037    {
038        this(pName,"blah, blah, blah...");
039    }//PNJ()
040    
041    /**
042     * Remove the speech at this index.
043     * @param pIndex The index of the speech.
044     */
045    public void removeSpeech(final int pIndex)
046    {
047        this.aSpeechs.remove(pIndex);
048    }//removeSpeech()
049    
050    /**
051     * Add a new speech to the pnj.
052     * @param pNewSpeech The new speech.
053     */
054    public void addSpeech(final String pNewSpeech)
055    {
056        this.aSpeechs.add(pNewSpeech);
057    }//setSpeech()
058    
059    /**
060     * Change the String 
061     * @param pString The new string.
062     */
063    public void changeSpeech(final String pString)
064    {
065        this.removeSpeech(0);
066        this.addSpeech(pString);
067    }//changeSpeech()
068    
069    /**
070     * Return the first speech of the pnj.
071     * @return The speech.
072     */
073    public String getFirstSpeech()
074    {
075        return this.aSpeechs.get(0);
076    }//getSpeech()
077    
078    /**
079     * Try to look for the corresponding speech in the pnj's
080     * speech list.
081     * Return a message error if no speech has been found for this index.
082     * @param pIndex The index.
083     * @return The speech or message error.
084     */
085    public String getSpeechIndex(final int pIndex)
086    {
087        String vChaine = "";
088        try
089        {
090            vChaine = this.aSpeechs.get(pIndex);
091        }
092        catch(Exception e)
093        {
094            vChaine = "No speech found for this number... try the \"look <PNJ name>\" command to see them. ";
095        }
096        finally
097        {
098            return vChaine;
099        }
100    }//getSpeechIndex()
101    
102    /**
103     * Return the name of the pnj.
104     * @return The name.
105     */
106    public String getName()
107    {
108        return this.aName;
109    }//getName()
110    
111    /**
112     * Return the speechs of the pnj.
113     * @return The speechs of the pnj.
114     */
115    public String getSpeechsString()
116    {
117        StringBuilder vSpeechs = new StringBuilder("Speechs of "+this.aName+" :\n");
118        for (int i=0; i<this.aSpeechs.size();i++)
119            vSpeechs.append(i+" -> "+this.aSpeechs.get(i)+"\n");
120        return vSpeechs.toString();
121    }//getSpeechs()
122}//Pnj
